import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' import "./TrainingFeedback.css" import Axios from 'axios' function TrainingFeedback(){ const location = useLocation() const {denumire, speaker} = location.state const [tema, setTema] = useState("") const [speakerFb, setSpeakerFb] = useState("") const [raport, setRaport] = useState(0) const handleFeedback = () => { Axios.post('http://localhost:3001/api/signup/business', { tema: tema, speaker: speakerFb, raport: raport, }).then(response => console.log(response)) } return(

Te rugam sa completezi formularul de feedback
